title: Looking for a Mathewson White Cap
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: Looking for a Mathewson White Cap
posts.post_content:
I've been working on the NY Giants Team set for awhile now and the Mathewson white cap is the last one I need. Looking for a 1.5-2 in an SGC holder but psa would not be a deal breaker.
Please let me know what you guys have available via PM or email [url]maxjacks89@yahoo.com[/url]. I've really enjoyed all the deals I've made on here so far

Thanks 
Max

 I'm also doing the T205 Giants set so if you have any 4-5 SGC graded let me know
I had a different deal fall through so I'm still looking
